en-US.summary: Provides the current conditions for the Loppet Foundation cross-country ski trails in Minneapolis, MN.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Ski Sloth what are the trail conditions
Alexa, ask Ski Sloth to give me a trail update
Alexa, ask Ski Sloth what the trails are like
en-US.name: ski-sloth
en-US.description:
Want to know the ski trail conditions before heading out to Theodore Wirth Park? 
Need to bring your rock skis or extra kick wax?
Ski Sloth has been out on the trails and knows all. Just say: Alexa, ask ski sloth for a trail update.


Ski Sloth was built and maintained by a volunteer not associated with the Loppet Foundation nor the Minneapolis Park and Recreation Board.
